title: Sage Integrative Medicine - Functional & Integrative Medicine Clinic
description: Comprehensive Functional Medicine clinic in Pennsylvania with an innovative approach to tailoring disease prevention and treatment by identifying root causes and takes into account differences in your genes, environments, and lifestyles.
